TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It doesn't even start at all. If it won't run it can't crash!

I wish Jeb would land on Mars.

Granted, but he lands on one of our rovers and we never even see him.

I wish for snow.

Granted. You are dropped into the middle of Antarctica.

I wish that I have infinite Funds.

Granted: But you receive it in the form of a single bill. As soon as you buy something, your funds will be limited because no one can give you infinite change

I wish I had infinite funds :-I

Granted. They're delivered in coins...in your pants.

I wish for paper and metal currency to be fully replaced by electronic currency.

Granted, but right before the switch you take out all your money as cash rendering it useless.

I wish for a trip to the Antarctic.

Granted. Through the miracle of time travel you're given a spot on the Discovery Expedition.

I wish for a gentle winter this year.

Granted, the winter brings you out for dinner and sends you roses.

I wish for a rough winter this year.

Granted, but it's only rough where you're at, and everyone wonders what the hell you're wearing that raincoat for xD

I wish for a gentle summer next year.

Granted, but Summer accidentally knocked the sun over. It fell onto the earth.

I wish for an object with significantly high mass to appear behind the earth.

Granted. It is the Deth Star. It blows up Earth.

I wish for a warp drive.

Granted. But it's moving away so fast it has no effect.

Edit: Darn I'm a slowpoke. Granted, but you lose it on its first unmanned test flight and it cannot be built anew.

I wish for Earth to be rescaled to the size of Kerbin so it would be easier to get into space.

Granted, only now there's 10 100 times more people living in your house than there normally were.

I wish it was always winter where I live!

Edited October 31, 2014 by Overfloater
A slight miscalculation :-3

Granted. You live at the nouth pole. But spacetime itself is so twisted that though it's always cold, it never snows.

I wish joints in KSP were more realistic.

Granted. Jebediah broke his knees on landing because of your wish.

I wish for a kg of feathers and a kg of lead.

Granted. The feathers are heavier and you go insane trying to work out why.

I wish for bread.

Granted. It is filled with grinded-up radium. Even worse, it's stale.

I wish for a life.

It's an awful life: you'd want to return to the forums (They always return.... Mwahahahahaha)

I wish For the worst christmas ever (corrupt That!)

Your Christmas is the best ever!

I wish for Earth to explode.

Granted. Wishing for something bad doesn't make it not bad.

I wish I had a self-carving pumpkin. Actually, that would be a cool idea if I wasn't planning a Kerbal pumpkin instead.

Granted. It carves you before carving itself.

I wish people would keep the pagan worship in Halloween.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted. You get slightly better than you are now, but that's your skill limit.

I wish my biscuits didn't break when I dunk them.

Granted. The cup explodes instead.

I wish that this past week hadn't been so bad for spaceflight. Two crashes?! Jeez!

Granted. But next week is even worse.

I wish I'd find this secret mission thing in the Pokemon demo.
